meanings.definition: Without a visible horizon or landscape
meanings.sent1: The dense forest was so vistaless that you couldn't see the sky.
meanings.sent2: The desert stretched out endlessly, vistaless in every direction.
meanings.sent3: The vistaless beach made it hard to find a good spot for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like a vistaless plain, devoid of any clear direction.
meanings.sent5: The vistaless expanse of water seemed to merge with the sky at the horizon.
